meanings.definition: Push one's lips or one's bottom lip forward as an expression of petulant annoyance or in order to make oneself look sexually attractive.
meanings.sent1: She would often pout when she didn't get her way.
meanings.sent2: Don't pout if things don't go as planned.
meanings.sent3: He tried to pout his way into getting extra dessert.
meanings.sent4: The clouds seemed to pout as the rain poured down.
meanings.sent5: The child's pouting face was a clear sign of her displeasure.

meanings.definition: A facial expression that typically indicates annoyance or displeasure.
meanings.sent1: Her pout was evident when she didn't win the game.
meanings.sent2: The toddler's pout was adorable but also a bit sad.
meanings.sent3: The cat's pout made everyone in the room chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The old house had a pout that seemed to reflect its history.
meanings.sent5: His pout was so convincing that his friends immediately knew he was upset.
